blueprint.description: Installs slack-term (a Slack client for your terminal) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [slack-term](https://github.com/erroneousboat/slack-term) features a colorful interface as well as keyboard shortcuts. It is one of, if not the, most well-received [Slack](https://slack.com/) client available on GitHub.
blueprint.name: slack-term
blueprint.title: slack-term
